column1: ICL3221E, ICL3222E, ICL3223E, ICL3232E, ICL3241E, and ICL3243E are 3.0V to 5.5V powered RS-232 transmitters/receivers providing Â±15kV ESD protection and meeting EIA/TIA-232 and V.28/V.24 specifications. They offer low operational and standby power consumption, on-chip charge pumps, and power-down functions, making them suitable for battery-powered or portable devices. These ICs ensure data rates up to 250kbps and are compatible with 3.3V and 5.0V systems.
